section.5: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Mus'ab b. Sa'd reported:I said prayer by the side of my father and placed my hands between my knees. My father said to me: Place your hands on your knees. I repeated that (the previous act) for the second time, and he struck at my hands and said: We have been forbidden to do so and have been commanded to place our palms on the knees
